players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I find it strange that Diana is dead so early in the game. Let's be vigilant and keep an eye on each other to ensure we can identify and eliminate any mafia among us."
Bob: "I agree with Charlie's sentiment. Let's all stay vigilant and work together to uncover any suspicious behavior or information that could help us identify the mafia among us."

Charlie: "I'd like to propose that we all share any information or observations we may have had since the last discussion round. This could include any suspicious behavior, conversations, or other clues that may help us identify the mafia among us."
You: "I think Diana's death is suspicious, but I don't want to point any fingers. Let's focus on finding the truth and keeping an eye on each other."

Bob: "I believe it's important that we all share any information or observations we may have had since the last discussion round. Given Diana's suspicious death, I think it's crucial that we work together to identify and eliminate any potential mafia among us as soon..."
